original_title: Dancing for Mr. B: Six Balanchine Ballerinas
overview: Six of George Balanchine's finest stars, Maria Tallchief, Mary Ellen Moylan, Melissa Hayden, Allegra Kent, Merrill Ashley and Darci Kistler pay a moving tribute to the legendary choreographer and tell how he shaped them as dancers and influenced their lives.
title: Dancing for Mr. B: Six Balanchine Ballerinas
